thread.title: Ivanka Trump Looks Smitten with Canadian PM Justin Trudeau
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump Looks Smitten with Canadian PM Justin Trudeau

author: Sarah Bellman
title: Ivanka Trump Looks Smitten with Canadian PM Justin Trudeau
text:
Ivanka Trump Looks Smitten with Canadian PM Justin Trudeau Desus and Mero talk about Ivanka's thirst for Canada's Prime Minister. 
Political views aside, there's something that people on all sides of the aisle can agree on: Canadian prime minister Justin Trudeau is an objectively attractive man. And it looks like Trump's favorite daughter, Ivanka, agrees. Take a look at the way the First Daughter hungrily eyes Trudeau during his recent visit to the White House. 
Tuesday night on Desus & Mero 's very special Valentine's Day episode, Kid Mero and Desus Nice talked about Ivanka's unapologetic puppy love and how the Donald needs to look outâ€”not only has Justin Trudeau outsmarted Trump's weird handshake power play move , but now he's moving in on his daughter (or she on him, at least). 
You can watch last night's Desus & Mero for free online now, and be sure to catch new episodes weeknights at 11 PM on VICELAND.
